keyPolicies.policyDescription: An end to cuts, enough doctors and nurses & £8bn more for social care.
A cap on energy bills and rent rises. An end to zero hours contracts & a £10 minimum wage.
A deal for you to approve, plus billions of investment in North East jobs.

issues.brexitEurope: A Jobs First Brexit. A deal for you to approve, plus billions of investment in North East jobs. A Pig's Ear Brexit. The Tory deal puts North East jobs & exports at risk with red tape & tariffs.
issues.economy: A Fair Deal. A cap on energy bills and rent rises. An end to zero hours contracts & a £10 minimum wage. Austerity. Ordinary people £800 worse off, 7 food banks in our constituency & more tax cuts for the rich.
issues.health: A Stronger NHS. An end to cuts, enough doctors and nurses & £8bn more for social care. Privatised Health. Closing wards in Bishop Hospital & risking our NHS in a Trump trade deal.

images.caption: Do you really want 5 more years of Tory cuts?
